select count(*) from recipe where replace(title,' ', '') like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
select b.* from( select r.* , rs.step_img from recipe r,recipe_step rs where r.no = rs.recipe_no and rs.step_no = 1 order by r.views + r.likes desc )b where rownum <= 5
select * from (select * from foodcategory order by dbms_random.value ) where rownum <= 3
select count(*) from recipe r, foodCategory b where r.foodcategoryno = b.no
